name: Agencia de desarrollo turístico "Medinalogo"
goal: Emprendimiento e integración social, dinamización y desarrollo rural, promoción e innovación turística, formación on line y ocio educativo.Los territorios son una oportunidad que podemos convertir en tesoros.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Europa Creativa: apoyar a los sectores culturales y creativos de Europa.
